name: 14.15-Fastx tool kit: FASTX barcode splitter
description: This program reads FASTA/FASTQ file and splits it into several smaller file, based on barcode matching

parameters.name: File prefix
parameters.description: File prefix. will be added to the output files. Can be used to specify output directories.

parameters.name: Max mismatches
parameters.description: Max. number of mismatches allowed. default is 1
